description: Unit test file for the GoogleBigQueryTools class, testing various methods such as run_sql_query, list_tables, and describe_table with mocked BigQuery client interactions.

classes.name: GoogleBigQueryTools
classes.description: A class providing tools to interact with Google BigQuery, tested in this file.

methods.name: test_run_sql_query_success
methods.description: Tests successful execution of run_sql_query method, verifying JSON output and query cleaning.

methods.name: test_list_tables_error
methods.description: Tests error handling in list_tables method when an exception occurs.

methods.name: test_describe_table_success
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval and JSON serialization of table schema in describe_table.

methods.name: test_describe_table_error
methods.description: Tests error handling in describe_table when get_table raises an exception.

methods.name: test_run_sql_query_empty_result
methods.description: Tests run_sql_query with an empty result set, expecting an empty JSON array.

methods.name: test_run_sql_query_error_in_client_query
methods.description: Tests run_sql_query handling when client.query raises an exception.
